attributes.action: Referendum now Vote of no confidence in David Cameron
attributes.additional_details:
Preview just look at the cuts to public services around you and the promises of reducing immigration .
Cameron promised to reduce for immigration figure to 10,000 in the last year 335,000 entered . Over stretched everything NHS included !
attributes.background:
How long does it take to negotiate terms . Conservatives want to stay in the EU Boys club that is costing the UK Tax payers Billions . 
Cuts in services but they can Spend on making War . Get us out now

rejection.details:
We think your petition might be similar to these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104471 (in relation to no confidence)

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105863 (in relation to the EU)
